entry.source: Demons have broken into our underground{F801}stash and are stealing our precious sake!{F801}The {F804,5}{F873,1}{F804,0}s are the ones doing this.{F801}To stop them, we're setting up a night watch.{F801}If you're strong, we'd like your help. Meet{F801}us across from the {F804,5}item shop under Shinjuku.{F804,0}{F801}
